column4: ok I made some changes to compiz, now ubuntu is crashed but ubuntu 2D works
anyone want to help me get ubuntu back? and what is the diff between ubuntu 2D and just ubuntu
Ubuntu2D doesn't use compiz.
should I just keep using Ubuntu2D, ?
how to I get ubuntu back
There's nothing wrong with using Unity2D if it works, but how to fix compiz depends on what exactly you did with compiz.
I set top edge left edge and right edge to 0 in the grid setting
In ccsm?
in cofiguration editor
Which configuration editor?
This solution should still apply then: http://askubuntu.com/questions/71926/resetting-compizconfig-settings-manager-settings
You really shouldn't be using that tool unless you know exactly what you are doing.
Whoever recommended its use should be smacked in the head.
I believe so
but it has such a pretty icon looks like it would be user friendly
If you want to customize Unity in the future, install MyUnity and use that tool. It's a lot safer.
I am writing that down will do
you know how to use MyUnity to stop unity from maximizing window when it is dragged to the top?
I don't really customize my desktop much, so I'm probably not the right person to ask.
you are ok with that annoying maximizing of windows when they are dragged to the top?
I prefer my windows maximized. :)
and wilee-nilee ok looks like I am back to normal, thanks for the help
